references.paper_title: Video-based ai for beat-to-beat assessment of cardiac function
references.reason: This paper is an important reference because it showcases AI's capability in assessing cardiac function, which is relevant to the MedSAM2 paper's focus on medical image and video analysis.

references.paper_title: U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This paper is important as U-Net is a fundamental architecture for medical image segmentation, forming the basis for many subsequent models, including those built using MedSAM2.

references.paper_title: nnU-Net: A self-configuring method for deep learning-based biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This is one of the top reference papers because it is about nnU-Net, a widely used and self-configuring method for deep learning-based biomedical image segmentation that is heavily used in the medical image analysis.
This is one of the top reference papers because it introduces the Segment Anything Model (SAM), which MedSAM2 builds upon and aims to improve for medical image segmentation.

references.paper_title: Sam 2: Segment anything in images and videos
references.reason: This is one of the top reference papers because it introduces SAM2, the specific version of SAM on which MedSAM2 is based and fine-tuned, making it a critical foundation for the presented work.
